desc.p: Allows defaulting of depository at Customer level.
Accepts *as a delimiter to accept Customer or Portfolio or Stock Exchange along with Company.
Accepts *as a delimiter to accommodate “or” condition to define values.
Must be a valid COMPANY id.
Default sub account for the depository and defaults based on conditions specified in fields from FILE to APP.VALUE
Field in the application specified in FILE based on the values of which conditions for depository default are set.
Must be a valid field in the application specified in FILE.
Operand associated with APP.FIELD and APP.VALUEto construct as selection sentence wvhich will be executed to determine the conditions for defaulting depository. .
Input must be one of EQ,LT,NE,LE,GT or Ge
Default depository for the company based on conditions specified in fields from FILE to APP.VALUE.
Must be a valid depository as specified in CUSTOMER.SECURITY
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
